markings: on PL side at back corner: foundry mark
signed: on PL side of base, incised: Renoir / 10A / 10
text: In this work Ronoir depicts his wife nursing their first-born son, Pierre. It was done after a painting of the same theme, and the bronze was cast, under Renoir's supervision, by a young sculptor named Guino, who worked with the old master.
title: Maternity
